issue.title: [Python] Add support for Duration type
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-5855](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-5855). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Add support for the Duration type (added in C++: ARROW-835, ARROW-5261)

- add DurationType and DurationArray wrappers
- add inference support for datetime.timedelta / np.timedelta64
